r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with libvips
r.d: This extension uses libvips to provide image processing facilities.
r.n: * Improve graceful fix from 1.0.3, see https://github.com/jcupitt/php-vips/issues/27 * Better notes section in package.xml, see https://github.com/jcupitt/php-vips/issues/28
